entries.message:
Event Type: Software Upgrade
Start Time: 2022-11-09 22:10:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-11-10 02:10:00 UTC

We will be performing software upgrades in this location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment. During the course of this maintenance window, your instance will be rebooted, and will be unavailable for several minutes. Please be aware that as we do not have access to your filesystem, this reboot will not be as clean as if it were done from within your OS, so preparing your software/filesystem with a graceful shutdown of services and the VPS itself would be advised.

Event Type: Software Upgrade
Start Time: 2022-11-07 22:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-11-07 23:00:00 UTC

We will be performing software upgrades in this location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment. During the course of this maintenance window, your instance will be rebooted, and will be unavailable for several minutes. Please be aware that as we do not have access to your filesystem, this reboot will not be as clean as if it were done from within your OS, so preparing your software/filesystem with a graceful shutdown of services and the VPS itself would be advised.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the New Jersey location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-11-10 10:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-11-10 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to New Jersey instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While itâ€™s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.
